Table of years in anime:

1979 1980 1981 1982 – 1983 – 1984 1985 1986 1987

The events of 1983 in anime.

Contents

  • 1 Events
  • 2 Accolades
  • 3 Releases
  • 4 References

Events[edit]

The first original video animation (OVA), Dallos, is released.

Accolades[edit]

  • Ōfuji Noburō Award: Barefoot Gen
